KnowledgeItem.Title: Install HAProxy And Deploy War
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for Installing HAProxy and Deploying war.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock HAProxyInstallAndDeployWarConfig and the necessary information for sucessful completion of workflow

Activate.XMLExtract: <NewBlock> <Tasks PKG=haproxy TargetMachine=${HIDW:TargetMachine} TargetState=Created User=${HIDW:User} Host=${HIDW:Host} Lib=PKG CurrentState=ReadState TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> /> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock> <Tasks PKG=tomcat7 TargetMachine=${HIDW:TargetMachine} TargetState=Created User=${HIDW:User} Host=${HIDW:Host} Lib=PKG CurrentState=ReadState TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks TargetMachine=${HIDW:TargetMachine} TargetState=Created Target_path="/var/lib/tomcat7/webapps" Download_url='${HIDW:WARUrl}' Host=${HIDW:Host} User=${HIDW:User} Lib=WGET CurrentState=ReadState TargetTar_FileName=${HIDW:TargetTar_FileName} TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks TargetMachine=${HIDW:TargetMachine} TargetState=Created Target_path="/etc/default" Download_url='${HIDW:ProxyEnableUrl}' Host=${HIDW:Host} User=${HIDW:User} Lib=WGET CurrentState=Deleted TargetTar_FileName="haproxy" TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks TargetMachine=${HIDW:TargetMachine} TargetState=Created Target_path="/etc/haproxy" Download_url='${HIDW:ProxyConfigURL}' Host=${HIDW:Host} User=${HIDW:User} Lib=WGET CurrentState=Deleted TargetTar_FileName="haproxy.cfg" TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks TargetMachine=${HIDW:TargetMachine} TargetState=Created ServiceName="haproxy" Host=${HIDW:Host} User=${HIDW:User} Lib=STARTSERVICE CurrentState=ReadState TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> </NewBlock>
